name: A missing shepherd
description:
The shepherd is missing. It's up to you to guide the sheeps. But be carefull, if one sheep move, all move!

Challenge yourself on this simple but challenging puzzle!

Controls:

  • Touchscren: slide the sheeps with your finger.
  • Keyboard: Move with WASD, arrow keys
  • Backspace: undo last move
  • R: restart level
  • Escape: go back to main menu
